title: Al - Wehdat faces Tajikistani Istiklol in AFC Champions League Tuesday | Sport
body_text:
21-10-2024 01:30 PM
Ammon News - Al-Wehdat soccer team is scheduled to face Istiklol Dushebe from Tajikistan at 5:00 pm on Tuesday in the third round of Group 3 of the AFC Champions League 2, taking place in Tajikistan.
Al-Wehdat is at the top of the group with 4 points, ahead of Sharjah on goal difference. Sepahan Isfahan is in third place with 3 points, and Istiklol Tajikistan is in fourth with no points.
Al-Wehdat aims to leave Tajikistan with a win in order to improve its prospects of advancing to the next stage of the competition.
The final training session for the Al-Wehdat team will take place on the match field on Monday evening to prepare for the upcoming strong and exciting match. Al-Wehdat aims to secure victory while the Tajik team aims to earn points to start building their points balance.
Al-Wehdat and Al-Hussein Irbid are notable for representing Jordanian football in the AFC Champions League 2.
